name: Kingdom Hanks 420/3.14 ECHOES Rebirth by Dreams
name_original: Kingdom Hanks 420/3.14 ECHOES Rebirth by Dreams
description:
Made for the AwfulJams TOM HANKS JAM, this game answers the age old question: What if Kingdom Hearts, but Tom Hanks?

The game is a top-down action game in the vein of Zelda with visual novel styled cutscenes. As it was made in a short amount of time with very limited art assistance (and zero musician assistance), it's incredibly short and kind of a mess. I plan to add a bit more to it after the jam.
